LanguageData.JeubSwarm: A swarm of hungry jeubs has been spotted approaching the colony. FLEE FOR YOUR LIVES!!!
LanguageData.WanderingCartographer: A cartographer has been spotted. It is said these creatures possess great speed. Speed that perhaps we could harness?
LanguageData.ST_WoodFrog_CommandDesc: Command the wood frog to undergo metamorphosis to finally reach its final form- a tree.
LanguageData.ST_LetterBones2Bananas: {0} has been converted into a banana, effectively resulting in {0_possessive} death.
LanguageData.ST_LetterBones2Cabbages: {0} has been converted into a cabbage, effectively resulting in {0_possessive} death.
LanguageData.NightFrogsArrived: A group of night frogs has entered the area. These predatory, venomous frogs can be a danger to your colonists- or an asset, if tamed.
LanguageData.STVidSpread: {PAWN_nameDef} has caught the 'vid. Consider masking up to prevent a pandemic.
